titles.title: Federal Construction Equity Act of 1993

A bill to prohibit discrimination in contracting with potential contractors and subcontractors in federally funded construction projects on the basis of certain labor relations policies of the potential contractors and subcontractors.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2642-2643)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Federal Construction Equity Act of 1993 - Amends the Office of Federal Procurement Policy Act to prohibit the denial of Federal construction contracts on the basis of the potential contractor's policy on collective bargaining.
